TRY IT FREE

Calculation of taxes and state payments

System computes taxes and state payments in parallel with payslips and generates income tax reports.

System supports taxation for companies working in Artsakh.

Support of the Law on IT benefits

Himnark People supports taxation for the companies who are granted right to work under the conditions of the Law on IT benefits.

Working time accounting

System computes the number of hours working and rest time based on the labor terms and HR records.

Lorem Ipsum dolor sit amet dolr quirn mari faarae geoe planet tool sitt ariis voyage
Overtime and night work

System calculates the overtime and night work pay based on the start and end hours such work.

Data export

In parallel with payslips system generates bookkeeping formulations of the payroll calculations. Users can export those records into AS Accountant 7.

Documentation Management

Generate labor contracts and amendments, orders, applications and certificates and maintain the history of generated documents.

Legislation changes

Changes of the legislation and regulations are automatically reflected in the system.

Shift work

System allows specifying and assigning shifts to employees. Working time and overtime/night pays are calculated automatically.

Health insurance

Himnark People allows specifying health insurance policy to employees and their family members. System runs taxation and accounting for this kind of benefit.

Payment processing

Payment documents are generated according to the payment method preferred by the employee. Payment documents can be printed and imported into AS Accountant 7.
